## 

Activity Plans and Modules

Explore the Activity Plans and supporting resources related to a variety of trades sectors, specific to the [Youth Explore Trades Skills program](/youth-explore-the-trades-program). 

These Activity Plans are organized by instructional modules and contain the PDF and Word versions of the full activity plan book as well as a zip file of the activity plans in separate Word files.

Youth Explore Trades

Core

**Core Module Activity Plan Book**

From safe work practices to employability skills, the Core Module addresses the terminology, skills, tools, materials, work environments, culture and career options of the various trades and industries.

[Download Entire Book PDF](/media/1919/download) | [Download Entire Book Word document](/media/1918/download)

This module contains the following core modules, activity plans, and handouts:

  * Safety

  * Careers

  * Transferable Skills

  * Training Programs and Certificates

  * Career Search Infographic

  * Communication 101

  * Customer Service Role Play

  * Research Certificate or Training Program




Separate Word files for each Activity Plan/Module: [Download ZIP](/media/1995/download)

Automotive Service Technician

**Automotive Service Technician Activity Plan Book**

[Download Entire Book PDF](/media/1922/download) | [Download Entire Book Word document](/media/1923/download)

This module includes the following activity plans:

  * Compressed Air

  * Tire Identification

  * Vehicle Inspection

  * Hand Tools and Power Tools

  * ...and more!




Separate Word files for each Activity Plan: [Download ZIP](/media/1985/download)

**Baker Activity Plan Book**

[Download Entire Book PDF](/media/1924/download) | [Download Entire Book Word document](/media/1925/download)

This module includes the following activity plans:

  * Baking Tools and Equipment Poster

  * Scale a Recipe

  * Describe the Function of Ingredients

  * Create Business Plan and Hold a Bake Sale

  * ...and more!




Separate Word files for each Activity Plan: [Download ZIP](/media/1986/download)

**Carpenter Activity Plan Book**

[Download Entire Book PDF](/media/1926/download) | [Download Entire Book Word document](/media/1927/download)

Separate Word files for each Activity Plan: [Download ZIP](/media/1988/download)

Design & Drafting (Non-Trade)

**Design & Drafting Activity Plan Book**

[Download Entire Book PDF](/media/1930/download) | [Download Entire Book Word document](/media/1931/download)

Separate Word files for each Module/Activity Plan: [Download ZIP](/media/1990/download)
